MacroOp.Name: OMNI_NEW_LINE
MacroOp.Brief: Defines the new line constant used based on system.
MacroOp.Description:
Defines the new line constant (@c "
" or @c "
" ) used based on platform/OS detected.
By default, on Windows based platforms the new line constant is @c "
" and on other platforms it is @c "
" (which can be changed via the OMNI_APLNL macro).
MacroOp.PlatformSpecific: By default, the newline constant is @c "\r\n" for Windows platforms and @c "\n" for other platforms. If you wish to have the default for Apple platforms be the @c "\r" (the default for older Apple systems), you'll need to define the OMNI_APLNL macro.
MacroOp.Synopsis: Defines the new line constant (@c "\n" or @c "\r\n" ) used based on system.
